bibdata.title: IEEE Trial-Use Design Guide for Wood Transmission Structures
IEEE Trial-Use Design Guide for Wood Transmission Structures

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The standard covers the structural design and application of wood transmission structures. The guide includes definitions, application of loads, structure application, characteristics of natural wood and laminated wood members, design stresses, fabrication of laminated wood members, connections, nonwood members, erection and framing, and quality assurance.<<ETX>>

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
